item.title: The scene of !kaua doro and the lion
item.summary: [The recto pages are not translated] The place the story occurred was shown to |han≠kass'o as a child by a man called !kou (it was his place), who also told him the name of the place (which sounded like !gao-sse).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-20
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: was shown the place where the story of !kaua doro and the lion was set as a child
the scene for '!kaua doro and the lion'
of the place where '!kaua doro and the lion' was set
